(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Gigantica missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">$npcName:23001006$ Mission</font> Medics can't keep up with those ijured fighting $npcName:23001006$ in $map:02020051$. Defeat the mechanoid monster!

quest.name: [Special] Gigantica's Tactics
quest.desc:
$npcName:23001006$ in $map:02020051$ is unlike any enemy Sky Fortress has ever encountered. Collect combat data on this strange monster by fighting it.
(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Gigantica missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">$npcName:23001006$ Mission</font> Study $npcName:23001006$'s tactics and strategies.

quest.name: [Special] Daemon Army Invasion 1
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001813$'s fingerprints are all over the disasters taking place in Kritias. Uncover his plot.
(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] First Legion missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.manual: Clear a legion battle in $map:02020061$ or $map:02020065$
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">First Legion Mission</font> $npcName:11001813$'s fingerprints are all over the disasters taking place in Kritias. Uncover his plot.

quest.name: [Special] Spreading Darkness 1
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001813$ taints everything he touches. Track down his corruption to its source.
(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] First Legion missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.manual: Clear a legion battle in $map:02020061$ or $map:02020065$
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">First Legion Mission</font> $npcName:11001813$ taints everything he touches. Track down his corruption to its source.

quest.name: [Special] Daemon Army Counterattack 1
quest.desc: The Daemon Army has practically occupied Kidel. If Sky Fortress is too defeat them, then they'll need more intelligence on the enemy forces. (Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] First Legion missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.manual: Clear a legion battle in $map:02020061$ or $map:02020065$
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">First Legion Mission</font> Daemon forces have occupied much of Kidel. If the Alliance is to defeat them, they'll need more intelligence on the enemy.

quest.name: [Special] Daemon Army Invasion 2
quest.desc:
The Daemon Army is on the move again, and this time their eyes are set on all of Kritias. Cut them off before they threaten Sky Fortress and its allies.
(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Second Legion missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.manual: Clear a legion battle in $map:02020062$ or $map:02020063$
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">Second Legion Mission</font> Daemon forces are on the move. Cut them off before they threaten Sky Fortress and its allies.

quest.name: [Special] Spreading Darkness 2
quest.desc:
Darkness surges through the land as $npcName:11001813$'s Daemon Army marches. This cannot be allowed!
(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Second Legion missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.manual: Clear a legion battle in $map:02020062$ or $map:02020063$
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">Second Legion Mission</font> Darkness surges through the land as $npcName:11001813$'s Daemon Army marches. This cannot be allowed!

quest.name: [Special] Daemon Army Counterattack 2
quest.desc: After all this time, you still know almost nothing about $npcName:11001813$. The Green Hoods have decided to study him by investigating his Daemon Army. (Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Second Legion missions until the weekly reset.)
quest.manual: Clear a legion battle in $map:02020062$ or $map:02020063$
quest.descFameUI: <font color="#00a2ed">Second Legion Mission</font> Darkness surges through the land as $npcName:11001813$'s Daemon Army marches. This cannot be allowed!

quest.name: No Other Option
quest.desc: $npcName:11004430$ keeps turning monsters to the side of evil. Curtail his vile efforts by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020001$ in $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020205$ in $map:02020031$, and $npcNamePlural:25020106$ in $map:02020030$.
quest.descFameUI: Evil is spreading through the land. Defeat the monsters that are most affected.

quest.name: Combat Aid
quest.desc: There are too many monsters for Sky Fortress's soldiers to handle. Help out by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020002$ in $map:02020029$ and $npcNamePlural:25020206$ in $map:02020031$.
quest.descFameUI: The enemy forces seem to have no end. It's only a matter of time before Sky Fortress is overwhelmed.

quest.name: Imminent Threat
quest.desc: Humanitas is in dire need of reinforcements. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020306$ in $map:02020006$, $npcNamePlural:25020406$ in $map:02020004$, and $npcNamePlural:25020506$ in $map:02020001$.
quest.descFameUI: Humanitas is being overwhelmed by waves of enemies. Help them fight back.

quest.name: For Humanitas
quest.desc: Humanitas is having a hard time holding back enemy attacks from $map:02020004$ and $map:02020001$. Help Humanitas by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020403$ in $map:02020004$ and $npcNamePlural:25020507$ in $map:02020001$.
quest.descFameUI: Help Humanitas defend from attacks in multiple directions.

quest.name: Strange Swords
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ is interested in the fencing techniques of Kritias. Study them by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020602$ in $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020802$ in $map:02020034$, and $npcNamePlural:25021004$ in $map:02020016$.
quest.descFameUI: $npcName:11004312$ wants to understand the fencing of Kritias. Experience this fencing for yourself.

quest.name: Brutal Bullets
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ prefers swordplay, but still wants to learn about the gunplay of Kritias. Study $npcNamePlural:25020604$ in $map:02020010$ and $npcNamePlural:25021005$ in $map:02020016$.
quest.descFameUI: Study how the enemy uses their guns to better prepare the crew of Sky Fortress for field engagements.

quest.name: Rookies in Danger
quest.desc: Due to a mix-up, rookie soldiers were accidentally sent into areas with heavy fighting. Protect them by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021106$ in $map:02020051$, $npcNamePlural:25021202$ in $map:02020017$, and $npcNamePlural:25021502$ in $map:02020003$.
quest.descFameUI: Protect some new recruits who have waded a little too far into the deep end.

quest.name: Heavy Foes
quest.desc: Heavily armored enemies have been spotted by Sky Fortress's advance scouts. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021205$ in $map:02020017$ and $npcNamePlural:25021406$ in $map:02020014$.
quest.descFameUI: Heavily armored enemies have been spotted. Defeat these enemies before they interfere with research and scouting operations.

quest.name: Tairen Interference
quest.desc: The road to innermost Kritias goes through $map:02020018$, $map:02020037$, and $map:02020035$, but Tairen has fortified all of these positions. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021703$ in $map:02020018$, $npcNamePlural:25022105$ in $map:02020037$, and $npcNamePlural:25021905$ in $map:02020035$.
quest.descFameUI: Tairen is holding several key routes through Kritias. Defeat them to secure the routes.

quest.name: Breaking Through
quest.desc: $map:02020018$ and $map:02020037$ appear to be gateways to the furthest reaches of Kritias. Help Sky Fortress's agents break through by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021702$ in $map:02020018$ and $npcNamePlural:25022102$ in $map:02020037$.
quest.descFameUI: Make way to the furthest reaches of Kritias by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021702$ in $map:02020018$ and $npcNamePlural:25022102$ in $map:02020037$.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000154$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ needs to study inert monsters to better understand how to fight them. Capture a $item:61000154$ from $map:02020031$.
quest.descFameUI: Capture $item:61000154$ in $map:02020031$ to help expand Sky Fortress's research efforts.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000155$
quest.desc: Sky Fortress continues its research on pacified monsters. Capture a $item:61000155$ in $map:02020006$.
quest.descFameUI: Capture $item:61000155$ in $map:02020006$ to help expand Sky Fortress's research efforts.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000159$
quest.desc: The monsters in $map:02020001$ look similar to the monsters of Maple World. Go to $map:02020001$ and capture a $item:61000159$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020001$ and capture a $item:61000159$.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000161$
quest.desc: The researchers of Sky Fortress need yet another monster to prove their new hypothesis. This time they need a $item:61000161$ from $map:02020034$.
quest.descFameUI: The researchers of Sky Fortress need yet another monster to prove their new hypothesis. This time they need a $item:61000161$ from $map:02020034$.

quest.name: Secrets of the Leshies
quest.desc: Unlike the other monsters of Kritias, leshies don't have much aetherine in their bodies. Instead, they wear aetherine pendants that they use for power. Could humans learn how to use this power? Collect $itemPlural:30001303$ from $npcNamePlural:25020901$ and $npcNamePlural:25020902$ in $map:02020013$.
quest.descFameUI: Leshies get power from the $itemPlural:30001303$ around their necks. Collect some for research.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000164$
quest.desc: Sky Fortress is turning its efforts on researching unusual monsters. Help the research by capturing $itemPlural:61000164$ in $map:02020051$.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress is researching unique monsters. Help the research by capturing $itemPlural:61000164$ in $map:02020051$.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000165$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ asked you to capture a $item:61000165$ from $map:02020033$.
quest.descFameUI: Capture a $item:61000165$ from $map:02020033$ for the Sky Fortress research team.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000170$
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress research team needs a $item:61000170$ from $map:02020033$ for their experiments.
quest.descFameUI: Sky Fortress is continuing its research on the monsters of Kritias. Go to $map:02020033$ and capture a $item:61000170$ to help with their research.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000166$
quest.desc: There is still a little more work to be done in the research on Kritias's monsters. Capture a $item:61000166$ in $map:02020018$ for the research team.
quest.descFameUI: There is still a little more work to be done in the research on Kritias's monsters. Capture a $item:61000166$ in $map:02020018$ for the research team.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000169$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004312$ needs you to capture a $item:61000169$ in $map:02020037$.
quest.descFameUI: Help the research team by capturing a $item:61000169$ in $map:02020037$.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000163$
quest.desc: One of the researchers accidentally let one of their monster specimens escape. Capture a replacement $item:61000163$ in $map:02020009$.
quest.descFameUI: One of the researchers accidentally let one of their monster specimens escape. Capture a replacement $item:61000163$ in $map:02020009$.

quest.name: Research Focus: $item:61000168$
quest.desc: Capture a $item:61000168$ in $map:02020008$. Don't worry; it's gentle.
quest.descFameUI: Capture a $item:61000168$ in $map:02020008$ for Sky Fortress's research team.

quest.name: Aetherine Source
quest.desc: A strange pit was discovered in $map:02020029$. $npcName:11004312$ believes that the monsters of $map:02020029$ get power from that pit. Enter $map:52100111$ in $map:02020029$ and search for a source of aetherine.
quest.manual: Search $map:52100111$ in $map:02020029$ for a source of aetherine
quest.descFameUI: Enter $map:52100111$ in $map:02020029$ and search for a source of aetherine.

quest.name: Seeking the $map:52100113$
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25020302$ are overwhelming $map:02020006$. $npcName:11004312$ wants to cut them off at their source. Enter the $map:52100113$ near the bridge in $map:02020006$ and get rid of their eggs.
quest.manual: Enter the $map:52100113$ in $map:02020006$ and destroy leecher eggs
quest.descFameUI: Enter the $map:52100113$ near the bridge in $map:02020006$ and get rid of their eggs.

quest.name: $map:02020033$'s Cannons
quest.desc: Humanitas is requesting help at $map:02020033$. Their cannons have suddenly stopped working; head out and provide emergency repairs.
quest.descFameUI: The Humanitas cannons in $map:02020033$ have failed. They need a dashing hero to come fix them.

quest.name: An Unusual Darkness
quest.desc: $npcName:11004316$ senses a dark aura that must be taken care of. Defeat the $npcNamePlural:25020005$ in $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020104$ in $map:02020030$, and $npcNamePlural:25020202$ in $map:02020031$.
quest.descFameUI: Battle the darkness by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020005$ in $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020104$ in $map:02020030$, and $npcNamePlural:25020202$ in $map:02020031$.

quest.name: Make Haste
quest.desc: $npcName:11004316$ met with the oracle last night. You must defeat $npcNamePlural:25020105$ in $map:02020030$ and $npcNamePlural:25020004$ in $map:02020029$.
quest.descFameUI: Avert disaster by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020105$ in $map:02020030$ and $npcNamePlural:25020004$ in $map:02020029$.

quest.name: Laid to Rest
quest.desc: $npcName:11004316$ has a duty to lay the souls of the corrupted to rest. Fulfill this duty on his behalf by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020306$ in $map:02020006$, $npcNamePlural:25020402$ in $map:02020004$, and $npcNamePlural:25020503$ in $map:02020001$.
quest.descFameUI: Lay the $npcNamePlural:25020306$ in $map:02020006$, $npcNamePlural:25020402$ in $map:02020004$, and $npcNamePlural:25020503$ in $map:02020001$ to rest.

quest.name: Knowledge from Violence
quest.desc: $npcName:11004316$ has received strange reports of the monsters in $map:02020006$. Go to $map:02020006$ and carefully observe $npcNamePlural:25020307$ and $npcNamePlural:25020305$.
quest.descFameUI: $npcName:11004316$ is interested in $map:02020006$. Go to $map:02020006$ and carefully observe $npcNamePlural:25020307$ and $npcNamePlural:25020305$.

quest.name: It Has to Be You
quest.desc: $npcName:11004316$ seeks to put a swift end to the enemies' resistance. He's sure that their forces will collapse if you defeat $npcNamePlural:25020606$ in $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020806$ in $map:02020034$, and $npcNamePlural:25021006$ in $map:02020016$.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020606$ in $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020806$ in $map:02020034$, and $npcNamePlural:25021006$ in $map:02020016$.

quest.name: Kharon's Plot
quest.desc: Kharon and the Daemon Army have been spotted exchanging information. Curb their cultural exchange by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020603$ in $map:02020032$ and $npcNamePlural:25020703$ in $map:02020010$.
quest.descFameUI: Keep Kharon in check by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020603$ in $map:02020032$ and $npcNamePlural:25020703$ in $map:02020010$.

quest.name: Secret of the Blue Light
quest.desc: Sky Fortress's researchers believe that monsters with a blue glow have aetherine in their bodies. $npcName:11004316$ wants you to look into this. Vivisect $npcNamePlural:25021101$ in $map:02020051$, $npcNamePlural:25021204$ in $map:02020017$, and $npcNamePlural:25021501$ in $map:02020003$.
quest.descFameUI: Conduct research on $npcNamePlural:25021101$ in $map:02020051$, $npcNamePlural:25021204$ in $map:02020017$, and $npcNamePlural:25021501$ in $map:02020003$.

quest.name: Inelegant Weapons
quest.desc: $npcName:11004316$ thinks that swords are better than guns. Even so, he wants to know more about the gunslingers of Kritias, so defeat $npcNamePlural:25021103$ in $map:02020051$ and $npcNamePlural:25021407$ in $map:02020014$.
quest.descFameUI: Swords are better than guns. Also, defeat $npcNamePlural:25021103$ in $map:02020051$ and $npcNamePlural:25021407$ in $map:02020014$.

quest.name: Cutting the Line
quest.desc: Despite your best efforts, the alliance between Kharon and the Daemon Army goes strong. Cut the lines between them by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021904$ in $map:02020035$, $npcNamePlural:25022005$ in $map:02020036$, and $npcNamePlural:25021602$ in $map:02020009$.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021904$ in $map:02020035$, $npcNamePlural:25022005$ in $map:02020036$, and $npcNamePlural:25021602$ in $map:02020009$.

quest.name: A Simple Conclusion
quest.desc: $npcName:11004316$ has identified the Deamon Army as the greatest threat in Kritias. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021903$ in $map:02020035$ and $npcNamePlural:25022001$ in $map:02020036$.
quest.descFameUI: Weaken the Daemon Army by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021903$ in $map:02020035$ and $npcNamePlural:25022001$ in $map:02020036$.

quest.name: Robot Bug Collections
quest.desc: The Lumiknights are exploring the many ways that Kritias differs from Maple World. They've grown interested with the strange robotic insects in $map:02020029$. Collect some insects from there.
quest.descFameUI: Collect robotic insects in $map:02020029$.

quest.name: Secret of the Dark Crystals
quest.desc: $npcNamePlural:25020104$ constantly appear in $map:02020030$ and $npcName:11004316$ doesn't know why. Go to $map:02020030$, investigate the dark crystals scattered all over the place, and collect some samples.
quest.descFameUI: Collect $itemPlural:30001297$ in $map:02020030$.

quest.name: Humanitas-ian Aid
quest.desc: The transmission tower in $map:02020030$ is being attacked by monsters. Repair the fence around the tower to prevent Humanitas from losing it.
quest.manual: Repair the fence near the tower in $map:02020030$
quest.descFameUI: Repair the fence near the transmission tower in $map:02020030$ to prevent monsters from approaching it.

quest.name: A Helping Hand
quest.desc: Sky Fortress's research team is overwhelmed, so $npcName:11004316$ has graciously offered your help. Examine the strange ore in $map:02020031$.
quest.descFameUI: Help the Sky Fortress research team by examining the strange ore in $map:02020031$.

quest.name: Waters of $map:02020001$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004316$ is impressed by the diversity of life in Kritias. He placed some devices disguised as plants in $map:02020001$ and needs you to see if they've gathered any new data.
quest.descFameUI: Find out if the monitoring devices in $map:02020001$ have gathered any data.

quest.name: Ship's Maintenance
quest.desc: The ship has been anchored in $map:02020041$ for a long time. $npcName:11004316$ says that it's your turn to do regular maintenance.
quest.descFameUI: Perform repairs on the Sky Fortress while it's anchored in $map:02020041$.

quest.name: $itemPlural:30000232$ for Research
quest.desc: $itemPlural:30000232$ grow in Kritias, too. $npcName:11004316$ is curious how it came to be there. Collect some for him for his "research."
quest.descFameUI: Collect $itemPlural:30000232$ for $npcName:11004316$'s research.

quest.name: Local Remedies
quest.desc: In this war, there is never a shortage of injured soldiers. Because supply lines are stretched thin between Kritias and Maple World, you need to gather a local herb called $item:30001299$ to use for medicine. You can harvest it from $npcName:25020705$ in $map:02020032$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020032$, examine $npcName:25020705$, and harvest $item:30001299$.

quest.name: $map:52100112$
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress team managed to hack some enemy robots, but the robots are finicky and difficult to control. Go to the $map:52100112$ in $map:02020041$ and get an update from $npcName:11004522$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to the $map:52100112$ in $map:02020041$ and get an update from $npcName:11004522$.

quest.name: Poings of Rage
quest.desc: The rafflesia of $map:02020013$ emit a constant fog of poison, and it's making the $npcNamePlural:11004342$ very, very angry. Go to $map:02020013$ and pacify them.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020013$ and take care of the angry poings there.

quest.name: Cherry Blossoms for Someone
quest.desc: $npcName:11004316$ has asked you to collect $item:30001300$ for him. It's not clear why he needs these blossoms, but you can find them in $map:02020014$.
quest.descFameUI: Get $itemPlural:30001300$ in $map:02020014$.

quest.name: Silent Research
quest.desc: Understanding $map:02020014$ is critical to understanding Kritias, but Sky Fortress has lost contact with its researchers there. Head out and make sure they're safe.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020014$ and make sure the researchers are safe.

quest.name: What's in a Waspling
quest.desc: Even though they live throughout Kritias, wasplings aren't yet well understood by the Sky Fortress team. A researcher spotted would appears to be a brood of baby wasplings in the north of the $map:02020017$. Go back there and examine the baby bugs.
quest.descFameUI: Go to the north of the $map:02020017$ and examine baby wasplings.

quest.name: $map:02020018$'s Dew
quest.desc: $map:02020018$ may be the highest region in all of Kritias and appears to be untouched by the technology that covers the rest of the continent. It is here that $item:30001301$ beads on the local plant life. Search these plants for this miraculous dew.
quest.descFameUI: Gather $item:30001301$ from the plants in $map:02020018$.

quest.name: Aetherine Botany
quest.desc: The plants of $map:02020037$ seem to have an unusually high level of aetherine. Head there and gather $itemPlural:30001302$ for $npcName:11004316$.
quest.manual: Examine the red plants in $map:02020037$ and collect $itemPlural:30001302$
quest.descFameUI: Examine the red plants in $map:02020037$ and gather $itemPlural:30001302$.

quest.name: Willing Investigator
quest.desc:
$npcName:11004315$ feels overwhelmed by her research on Kritias. Help her by gathering information on the $npcNamePlural:25020003$ in $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020103$ in $map:02020030$, and $npcNamePlural:25020203$ in $map:02020031$.
In this case, "gathering information" means "defeating," of course.
quest.descFameUI: Gather information on the $npcNamePlural:25020003$ in $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020103$ in $map:02020030$, and $npcNamePlural:25020203$ in $map:02020031$.

quest.name: Peculiar Foes
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ never has enough data on the villains of Kritias! You volunteered to investigate the $npcNamePlural:25020101$ in $map:02020030$ and $npcNamePlural:25020201$ in $map:02020031$ to help Sky Fortress. Fight them and figure out what makes them unique.
quest.descFameUI: Fight $npcNamePlural:25020101$ in $map:02020030$ and $npcNamePlural:25020201$ in $map:02020031$ to learn what makes them special.

quest.name: No Time to Waste
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ is worried about the frequent injuries to the agents sent to $map:02020004$, $map:02020001$, and $map:02020006$. Help $npcName:11004315$ by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020405$ in $map:02020004$, $npcNamePlural:25020502$ in $map:02020001$, and $npcNamePlural:25020303$ in $map:02020006$ who are giving her people trouble.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020405$ in $map:02020004$, $npcNamePlural:25020502$ in $map:02020001$, and $npcNamePlural:25020303$ in $map:02020006$ to protect Sky Fortress's people.

quest.name: Her Hypothesis
quest.desc: It bothers $npcName:11004315$ that $npcName:11004316$ has been snooping on her research since arriving in Kritias. Now she wants help proving her hypothesis about blue monsters before her rival can swoop in. Study the $npcNamePlural:25020302$ in $map:02020006$ and $npcNamePlural:25020505$ in $map:02020001$.
quest.descFameUI: Prove $npcName:11004315$'s hypothesis by investigating $npcNamePlural:25020302$ in $map:02020006$ and $npcNamePlural:25020505$ in $map:02020001$.

quest.name: Systematic Investigation
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ wants to bring some order to Sky Fortress's research strategy. Start by studying mechanical monsters with unique shapes. You can do this by fighting $npcNamePlural:25020605$ in $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020807$ in $map:02020034$, and $npcNamePlural:25021001$ in $map:02020016$.
quest.descFameUI: Gather data by fighting $npcNamePlural:25020605$ in $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020807$ in $map:02020034$, and $npcNamePlural:25021001$ in $map:02020016$.

quest.name: Poings Everywhere
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ is in awe of the variety of monsters who call Kritias their home. She's particularly interested in $npcNamePlural:11004342$. Research them by hunting $npcNamePlural:25020704$ in $map:02020032$ and $npcNamePlural:25020905$ in $map:02020013$.
quest.descFameUI: Research $npcNamePlural:25020704$ in $map:02020032$ and $npcNamePlural:25020905$ in $map:02020013$.

quest.name: Not Enough Data
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ rolodex of monsters is missing critical details for certain species. Help fill in the gaps by fighting $npcNamePlural:25021102$ in $map:02020051$, $npcNamePlural:25021203$ in $map:02020017$, and $npcNamePlural:25021401$ in $map:02020014$.
quest.descFameUI: Gather data on $npcNamePlural:25021102$ in $map:02020051$, $npcNamePlural:25021203$ in $map:02020017$, and $npcNamePlural:25021401$ in $map:02020014$.

quest.name: Perfection
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ rolodex of monsters is missing critical details for certain species. Help fill in the gaps by fighting $npcNamePlural:25021104$ in $map:02020051$ and $npcNamePlural:25021201$ in $map:02020017$.
quest.descFameUI: Gather information by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021104$ in $map:02020051$ and $npcNamePlural:25021201$ in $map:02020017$.

quest.name: Fearful Future
quest.desc: Sky Fortress is gathering data on the plant monsters of Kritias. It seems that Kharon and Tairen is plotting to use these monsters in their armies. Disrupt their plan by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021801$ in $map:02020008$, $npcNamePlural:25021603$ in $map:02020009$, and $npcNamePlural:25022101$ in $map:02020037$.
quest.descFameUI: Disrupt Tairen's plan by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021801$ in $map:02020008$, $npcNamePlural:25021603$ in $map:02020009$, and $npcNamePlural:25022101$ in $map:02020037$.

quest.name: Next Steps
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ has identified the Daemon Army as a major threat. Keep them in check by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021901$ in $map:02020035$ and $npcNamePlural:25022002$ in $map:02020036$.
quest.descFameUI: Keep the Daemon Army in check by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021901$ in $map:02020035$ and $npcNamePlural:25022002$ in $map:02020036$.

quest.name: Rumors of Treasure
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ wants you to look into a strange rumor. They say that whosoever can move the heart of the giant $npcName:11004342$ in $map:02020006$ will uncover a great treasure. Investigate this rumor.
quest.manual: Move the heart of the giant $npcName:11004342$ in $map:02020006$
quest.descFameUI: They say that whosoever who can move the heart of the giant $npcName:11004342$ in $map:02020006$ will uncover a great treasure.

quest.name: Checking In
quest.desc: Sky Fortress deployed a squadron on a difficult mission in $map:02020031$, but they've lost contact. Travel there and check in on them.
quest.descFameUI: Check on the Sky Fortress agents in $map:02020031$.

quest.name: $map:02020034$ Rumor: Rings
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ is researching the rumors of Kritias. They say that there's a machine in $map:02020034$ that summons a shiny ring in the sky. Head there and see if there's any truth to the rumor, then use a flying mount to go through the ring.
quest.manual: Use the mysterious device in $map:02020034$ and go through the shiny ring
quest.descFameUI: There's a rumor about a shiny ring and a strange machine in $map:02020034$.

quest.name: $map:02020016$ Rumor: Blossoms
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ heard a new rumor. Apparently there's a device in $map:02020016$ that makes flowers bloom! Head there and see if you can get the device to work.
quest.manual: Use the device in $map:02020016$ to make flowers bloom
quest.descFameUI: See if there's really a machine in $map:02020016$ that makes flowers bloom.

quest.name: $map:02020032$ Rumor: Treasure Run
quest.desc: At the $map:02020032$, soldiers are reporting that adventurers are loitering around the binoculars, than taking off at full speed. What could be going on over there?
quest.manual: Find out why people are running in $map:02020032$
quest.descFameUI: Adventurers have been spotted running at full speed around the $map:02020032$. What could they possibly be running for?

quest.name: $map:02020014$ Rumor: Sky Garden
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ heard a new rumor. It seems that there's a machine in $map:02020014$ that makes floating platforms appear. Head out and see if there's any truth to that.
quest.manual: Use the device in $map:02020014$ and climb the platforms
quest.descFameUI: There's a rumor about floating platforms in $map:02020014$.

quest.name: $map:02020017$ Rumor: Rings
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ is looking into rumors from Kritias. $map:02020017$ also has a device that summons shiny rings in the sky. You should check it out.
quest.manual: Use the mysterious device in $map:02020017$ and go through the shiny ring
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020017$ and use the device to summon a shiny ring.

quest.name: $map:02020018$ Rumor: Sky Garden
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ heard a rumor about floating platforms in $map:02020018$. Are these the same platforms from that other rumor? There's only one way to find out.
quest.manual: Use the device in $map:02020018$ and climb the platforms
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020018$, operate a weird machine, and jump on floating platforms.

quest.name: $map:02020035$ Rumor: Rings
quest.desc: A scout witnessed a shiny ring in the sky near $map:02020035$. Head out there and check it out.
quest.manual: Use the mysterious device in $map:02020035$ and go through the shiny ring
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020035$, use the mysterious device, and check out the shiny ring.

quest.name: $map:02020009$ Rumor: Guardian
quest.desc: The Sky Fortress team encountered a stubbornly stationary $npcName:11004342$ some time ago, and now another has been spotted in $map:02020009$. $npcName:11004315$ doesn't know what it's guarding, but she wants to find out.
quest.manual: Find out what the $npcName:11004342$ in $map:02020009$ is guarding
quest.descFameUI: See what $npcName:11004342$ wants and give it freedom.

quest.name: $map:02020008$ Rumor: Blossoms
quest.desc: A familiar device has been spotted in $map:02020008$. According to rumors, it causes flowers to blossom on nearby trees. $npcName:11004315$ wants you to check it out.
quest.manual: Use the device in $map:02020008$ to make flowers bloom
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020008$ and use the device to make the flowers bloom.

quest.name: $map:02020037$ Rumor: Blossoms
quest.desc: A familiar device has been spotted in $map:02020037$. According to rumors, it causes flowers to blossom on nearby trees. $npcName:11004315$ wants you to check it out.
quest.manual: Use the device in $map:02020037$ to make flowers bloom
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020037$ and use the device to make the flowers bloom.

quest.name: $map:02020033$ Rumor: Treasure Run
quest.desc: $npcName:11004315$ has an idea why some adventurers have been spotted zipping about certain areas of Kritias. She claims that there's a machine that causes treasure chests to appear. She heard about just such a machine in $map:02020033$ and wants you to check it out.
quest.descFameUI: Use the device in $map:02020033$, find the treasure chest, and open it.

quest.name: $map:02020036$ Rumor: Treasure Run
quest.desc: Treasure runners have been witnessed in $map:02020036$. Give it a go and report your findings to $npcName:11004315$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020036$, use the device, and run for the treasure chest.

quest.name: Unidentified Researcher
quest.desc: $npcName:11004485$ is a Sky Fortress researcher in $map:02020009$. The problem is... $npcName:11004315$ doesn't know who he is or what he's researching. As a responsible head of research, she wants you to find out for her.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020009$ and find out what $npc:11004485$ is doing.

quest.name: Sincere Help
quest.desc: The refugees of $map:02020066$ have been isolated as the path was blocked with the appearance of the Daemon Army... $npcName:11004614$ wants to the help the refugees as the Maple Alliance entered the northern part of Kidel. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to help the refugees who are in danger because of the harsh environment. You need to receive the '$quest:40002797$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to help the refugees who are in danger
quest.descFameUI: You need to go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to help the refugees who are in danger.

quest.name: Special Forces Mission: Humanitas
quest.desc: Humanitas formed the special forces to enhance the capabilities of the regular army. The special forces are doing the most dangerous missions in the front line. Carry out the special forces mission given by $npcName:11004614$ and overcome your limit.
quest.manual: Carry out the special forces mission of Humanitas
quest.descFameUI: You will be deployed to an advanced mission of Humanitas special forces. Mission Subject: Humanitas

quest.name: Result of Persistent Effort
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ seems very excited. The desperate efforts of the Humanitas Intelligence Agency finally found one of the Kharon's bases. $npcName:25022900$ is said to be there. Go to $map:52100114$ which is connected to $map:02020067$ and defeat $npcName:25022900$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:52100114$ in $map:02020067$ and defeat $npcName:25022900$.

quest.name: Great Adventure of the Unknown - Her Responsibility
quest.desc: You obtained information of the great damage incurred on the Leshy from the attack by Poings exposed to aetherine. $npcName:11004614$ feels guilty of the change in the Poings since aetherine is a part of their civilization. Meet $npcName:11004620$ and save the Leshy that are in danger before the damage gets worse. You need to receive the '$quest:40002798$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npcName:11004620$ to save the Leshy that are in danger
quest.descFameUI: You need to go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npcName:11004620$ to save the Leshy that are in danger.

quest.name: $map:02020071$ Assault
quest.desc: The Maple Alliance and Humanitas succeeded in driving the Daemon Army up north in Kidel. However, $map:02020071$ is still impregnable. Despite the many sacrifices by the Humanitas regular army, they couldn't pass through the entrance of the fortress. $npcName:11004614$ is concerned they won't be able to carry out this operation if the losses continue. It is time for you to act. Assault $map:02020071$ and defeat $npcName:25022702$, $npcName:25022704$, and $npcName:25022701$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020071$ and defeat $npcName:25022702$, $npcName:25022704$, and $npcName:25022701$.

quest.name: Special Forces Mission: Humanitas
quest.desc: Humanitas formed the special forces to enhance the capabilities of the regular army. The special forces are doing the most dangerous missions in the front line. Carry out the special forces mission given by $npcName:11004614$ and overcome your limit.
quest.manual: Carry out the special forces mission of Humanitas
quest.descFameUI: You will be deployed to an advanced mission of Humanitas special forces. Mission Subject: Humanitas

quest.name: Great Adventure of the Unknown - Mysterious Watchman
quest.desc: The place where $map:02020070$ and $map:02020071$ were built used to be a farm belt managed by Tairen. They stopped farming when the land became ruined, but for some reason, 2 Tairen guard robots defending the farm are attacking lifeforms... This is causing difficulty in conquering $map:02020070$ and $map:02020071$. Destroy $npcName:25022800$ in $map:02020070$ and $npcName:25022810$ in $map:02020071$.
quest.descFameUI: Destroy $npcName:25022800$ in $map:02020070$ and $npcName:25022810$ in $map:02020071$.

quest.name: Crisis in $map:02020066$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said Tairen started to attack $map:02020066$. $npcName:11004614$ believes this act of Tairen is to prevent Humanitas from increasing its forces by absorbing the refugees. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to get a clear understanding of the situation. Then help the refugees. You need to receive the '$quest:40002799$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to help the refugees who are in danger
quest.descFameUI: You need to go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to help the refugees who are in danger.

quest.name: Refugees Getting Rounded Up
quest.desc: In order to get food, Kharon is kidnapping refugees that went to $map:02020067$. $npcName:11004614$ is requesting help as she can no longer watch Kharon harassing the refugees. Go to $map:02020066$ and get a clear understanding of the situation from $npc:11004574$. Then help the refugees. You need to receive the '$quest:40002800$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to help the refugees who are in danger
quest.descFameUI: You need to go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to help the refugees who are in danger.

quest.name: Special Forces Mission: Humanitas
quest.desc: Humanitas formed the special forces to enhance the capabilities of the regular army. The special forces are doing the most dangerous missions in the front line. Carry out the special forces mission given by $npcName:11004614$ and overcome your limit.
quest.manual: Carry out the special forces mission of Humanitas
quest.descFameUI: You will be deployed to an advanced mission of Humanitas special forces. Mission Subject: Humanitas

quest.name: Forest Getting Tainted Black
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ obtained information that the Daemon Army is polluting the forest to steal the 'mysterious power' of the Leshy. $npcName:11004614$ said the Daemon Army will become a great threat to Humanitas and the Maple Alliance if this power falls into their hand. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npcName:11004620$ to prevent the mysterious power from falling into the hand of the Daemon Army. You need to receive the '$quest:40002801$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npcName:11004620$ to stop the crisis faced by the Leshy
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npcName:11004620$ to prevent the mysterious power from falling into the hand of the Daemon Army.

quest.name: Lifeforms Encroached by the Dark Power
quest.desc: The lifeforms encroached by the dark power headed for $map:02020069$ according to the Humanitas squad. $npcName:11004614$ thinks the Daemon Army is moving the encroached host to steal the 'mysterious power' passed down to the Leshy. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npcName:11004620$ to prevent the mysterious power from falling into the hand of the Daemon Army. You need to receive the '$quest:40002802$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npcName:11004620$ to stop the crisis of the Leshy
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npcName:11004620$ to prevent the mysterious power from falling into the hand of the Daemon Army.

quest.name: Great Adventure of the Unknown - Refugees in Crisis
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said both $map:02020066$ and $map:02020067$ are being attacked simultaneously by Kharon. This might be a full-scale attack by Kharon to take $map:02020066$. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to help the refugees in crisis. You need to receive the '$quest:40002803$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to help the refugees who are in danger
quest.descFameUI: You need to go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to help the refugees who are in danger.

quest.name: $npcName:11004614$'s Concern
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ is reorganizing the troops deployed to $map:02020070$ as they suffered great loss. $map:02020070$ is a gateway to $map:02020071$, but the loss to the allies are increasing due to the strong defense. Suppress the Daemon Army forces in $map:02020070$ to save $npcName:11004614$ the trouble. Go to $map:02020070$ and defeat $npcName:25022603$, $npcName:25022600$, and $npcName:25022605$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020070$ and defeat $npcName:25022603$, $npcName:25022600$, and $npcName:25022605$.

quest.name: Reason for Being Unable to Hunt
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said hunting in $map:02020066$ decreased noticeably. Since hunting is the main source of food for the refugees, something must have happened in $map:02020066$. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find out what happened. You need to receive the '$quest:40002804$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find out what happened
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find out what happened.

quest.name: Special Forces Mission: Humanitas
quest.desc: Humanitas formed the special forces to enhance the capabilities of the regular army. The special forces are doing the most dangerous missions in the front line. Carry out the special forces mission given by $npcName:11004614$ and overcome your limit.
quest.manual: Carry out the special forces mission of Humanitas
quest.descFameUI: You will be deployed to an advanced mission of Humanitas special forces. Mission Subject: Humanitas

quest.name: Beasts of the Daemon Army
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the squad suffered greatly from the beasts released by the Daemon Army. They were hit hard especially in $map:02020067$ and $map:02020068$. If any more get injured, this will cause a problem with the Humanitas operation. This cannot be left alone. Defeat $npcName:25022302$ in $map:02020067$ and $npcName:25022401$ in $map:02020068$.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcName:25022302$ in $map:02020067$ and $npcName:25022401$ in $map:02020068$.

quest.name: Schism of the Leshy
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said there are signs of a schism in the Leshy. According to the squad, there has been a sharp increase of a group of Leshies indulging in violence. It is concerning since $npc:11004620$ the peacekeeper might be losing leadership. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to understand the situation. You need to receive the '$quest:40002805$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to help the Leshy
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to help the Leshy.

quest.name: Special Forces Mission: Humanitas
quest.desc: Humanitas formed the special forces to enhance the capabilities of the regular army. The special forces are doing the most dangerous missions in the front line. Carry out the special forces mission given by $npcName:11004614$ and overcome your limit.
quest.manual: Carry out the special forces mission of Humanitas
quest.descFameUI: You will be deployed to an advanced mission of Humanitas special forces. Mission Subject: Humanitas

quest.name: Demoralized
quest.desc: The allied soldiers that were attacking $map:02020070$ and $map:02020071$ are afraid. $npcName:11004614$ said it's because of a fearsome monster from the Daemon Army that attacks and disappears completely. There are rumors of it being a ghost among the soldiers and they have been demoralized. They have to be suppressed before the damage gets bigger. Go to $map:02020070$ and defeat $npcName:25022601$, go to $map:02020071$ and defeat $npcName:25022700$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020070$ and defeat $npcName:25022601$, go to $map:02020071$ and defeat $npcName:25022700$.

quest.name: Drone in $map:02020066$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the number of surveillance drones in $map:02020066$ decreased noticeably. It will be hard to defend $map:02020066$ if the number of drones decrease. It's a question why the number of those in operation have been reduced. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find out why the number of drones has decreased. You need to receive the '$quest:40002806$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find out why the number of drones decreased
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find out why the number of drones decreased.

quest.name: Sympathy of $npcName:11004614$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ requested that you just go to $map:02020066$. She's always concerned of the refugees living in a barren land. You were determined to help the refugees to live up to $npcName:11004614$'s sympathy. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to resolve any difficulties there. You need to receive the '$quest:40002807$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to resolve the difficulties of the refugees
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to resolve the difficulties of the refugees.

quest.name: Unusual Movement of Kharon
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said Kharon activity increased noticeably near $map:02020067$. That's the base of the refugees where they hunt for their livelihood, risking the danger of getting kidnapped. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find out whether they suffered because of Kharon. You need to receive the '$quest:40002808$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find out whether the refugees are suffering
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find out whether they suffered because of Kharon.

quest.name: Reasonable Anger
quest.desc: While scouting, $npc:11004393$ saw Kharon harassing the refugees for fun. Something has to be done to those monsters. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to defeat the Kharon forces. You need to receive the '$quest:40002809$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to defeat the Kharon forces
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to defeat the Kharon forces.

quest.name: Concern to Protect the Mysterious Power
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ is always concerned of the plot by the Daemon Army to steal the mysterious power. She would like to tighten the security of $map:02020069$, but the Leshy will not allow Humanitas to be stationed there. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to find a solution. You need to receive the '$quest:40002810$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to find a solution
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to find a solution.

quest.name: Suspicious $npcName:11004614$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ was not able to sleep recently due to various concerns. She asked that you obtain $item:30001356$ which is effective for sleeping. You can't watch the leader of Humanitas not go to sleep. Go to $map:02020068$, suppress $npcName:25022407$, and get $item:30001356$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020068$, suppress $npcName:25022407$, and get $item:30001356$.

quest.name: Intelligence Department's Prediction
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the lifeforms inhabiting near $map:02020069$ started to surround the nest. She thinks the lifeforms were encroached by the Daemon Army and being controlled. If nothing is done, $map:02020069$ will be attacked by the lifeforms controlled by the Daemon Army. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to inform of this crisis and find a solution. You need to receive the '$quest:40002811$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to inform of this crisis
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to inform of this crisis.

quest.name: Rugged $map:02020069$
quest.desc: According to $npcName:11004614$, they received intel that the atmosphere in $map:02020069$ became chaotic. $npcName:11004614$ said Leshies doing business decreased and there are even Leshies who don't leave their home. Seeing how there's no change with the Daemon Army's movements, she's certain something else is happening. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to understand the situation. You need to receive the '$quest:40002812$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to understand the situation
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to figure out why the atmosphere became chaotic.

quest.name: Effort to Expose the Evilization
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ and the Humanitas Research Institute are making an effort to investigate the principle of evilization. Evilization is a power of darkness that the Daemon Army used to make the mechanical soldiers of Tairen come under their command. $npcName:11004614$ said they can make progress in their research if you can get the parts of the mechanical soldiers that turned evil. Go to $map:02020071$, defeat $npcName:25022707$ and $npcName:25022708$, and retrieve $item:30001357$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020071$, defeat $npcName:25022707$ and $npcName:25022708$, and retrieve $item:30001357$.

quest.name: Reveal the Identity of the One-horned Monster
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the attack on $map:02020070$ failed again due to $npcName:25022601$ of the Daemon Army. They watch the soldiers from the air and then attack at lightning speed. If the research team could study the principle of that speed, they can reduce the damage to the soldiers. For that, $npcName:11004614$ asks that you get $item:30001358$. Go to $map:02020070$, defeat $npcName:25022601$, and get $item:30001358$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020070$, defeat $npcName:25022601$, and get $item:30001358$.

quest.name: Overflowing Humanitas Military Hospital
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the Humanitas military hospital is overflowing with patients. All of them are soldiers bitten by robot spiders in $map:02020071$. Your entire body becomes paralyzed once bitten by the robot spiders. $npcName:11004614$ said many more soldiers need to be dispatched to evacuate the paralyzed soldiers. The mounting damage must be stopped. Go to $map:02020071$ and defeat $npcName:25022705$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020071$ and defeat $npcName:25022705$.

quest.name: An Oppontent to Contend Against
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said that attack on $map:02020071$ failed again due to the one-horned monster of the Daemon Army. It habitually scatters the battle formation of our soldiers by circling in the air and using a tactic of dropping down at lightning speed. Listening to $npcName:11004614$ stimulated your competitive spirit. Go to $map:02020071$ and contend against $npcName:25022700$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020071$ and contend against $npcName:25022700$.

quest.name: Great Idea to Obtain Aetherine
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the production of aetherine in $map:02020030$ isn't going smoothly due to the prolonged war with Tairen. The parts of the aetherine reactor are old and aren't performing as they should. She said there's an aetherine generator in $map:02020034$ set up by Tairen. $npcName:11004614$ said the aetherine reactor in $map:02020030$ will function as it should if a part called STX-17 can be taken from the generator. Go to $map:02020034$ and get the aetherine generator part STX-17.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020034$ and get the aetherine generator part STX-17
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020034$ and get the aetherine generator part STX-17.

quest.name: Lunatic Highway
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the intelligence department found Tairen's $map:52100115$ in $map:02020013$. She thinks Tairen is planning on linking $map:02020013$ and $map:02020010$ with a highway. Once the construction is complete, $map:02020013$ the supply route will be attacked by Tairen forces from $map:02020010$ via the highway. You can't watch the collapse of the Humanitas supply route. Go to $map:52100115$ linked to $map:02020013$ and suppress $npcName:25023000$, $npcName:25023001$, and $npcName:25023002$ that are put into the construction.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:52100115$ linked with $map:02020013$ and suppress $npcName:25023000$, $npcName:25023001$, and $npcName:25023002$.

quest.name: Treasure Island of Kharon
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the reconnaissance team discovered $map:52100116$ in $map:02020003$. Analyzing the video footage revealed it be a warehouse storing food produced by the refugees put to hard labor by Kharon. $npcName:11004614$ said if $map:52100116$ can be attacked and the security forces neutralized, the allied soldiers can seize the food. Go to $map:52100116$ in $map:02020003$, and suppress $npcName:25023100$ and $npcName:25023101$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:52100116$ in $map:02020003$, and suppress $npcName:25023100$ and $npcName:25023101$.

quest.name: Defend $map:02020014$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said Tairen placed an explosive in $map:02020014$. $map:02020014$ was built by Humanitas to preserve and study the flora and fauna of Kidel. She thinks Tairen wants to blow up all of $map:02020014$ seeing the scale of the explosive. You can't watch $map:02020014$ get destroyed. Go to $map:02020014$ and disarm the MK42 explosive placed by Tairen.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020014$ and disarm the MK42 explosive placed by Tairen
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020014$ and disarm the MK42 explosive placed by Tairen.

quest.name: Group of Evil and Hoodlums
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said Kharon started to release some of the supply boxes they got from Tairen to the Leshy hoodlums. The reason was to win over the Leshy hoodlums and mobilize them in kidnapping refugees. $npcName:11004614$ is concerned that the kidnapping of refugees will be accelerated if the Leshy hoodlums are won over. Go to $map:02020008$ and seize the supply box before it goes to the Leshy hoodlums.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020008$ and seize the supply box
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020008$ and seize the supply box before it goes to the Leshy hoodlums.

quest.name: Mysterious Power of the Ancient Temple
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said $map:02020018$ is a temple of Kritias built during ancient times. No one knows who built the temple and for what purpose since it was a long, long time ago. $npcName:11004614$ said the research team are investigating relics emitting a blue light in $map:02020018$. She said they haven't found out the identity of the blue light or the function of the relic, but they won't give up and will continue researching. Go to $map:02020018$ and get the shiny blue relic for the research team.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020018$ and get the shiny blue relic
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020018$ and get the shiny blue relic for the Humanitas research team.

quest.name: Hiding Place of Corruption
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the intelligence team finally discovered the secret residence of the Leshy hoodlums after much effort. The place called $map:52100117$ exists in a secret place in $map:02020008$. She said the Leshy hoodlums made $map:52100117$ their base and are attacking strangers and expanding their forces. A huge blow can be dealt to the Leshy hoodlums if $map:52100117$ is attacked. Go to $map:52100117$ in $map:02020008$, and suppress $npcName:25023201$ and $npcName:25023202$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:52100117$ in $map:02020008$, and suppress $npcName:25023201$ and $npcName:25023202$.

quest.name: Defense System of Tairen
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the Humanitas-Maple Alliance surprise attack on $map:02020037$ failed. The attack was discovered due to the intruder detection sensor set up in $map:02020037$. $npcName:11004614$ is discouraged saying that future surprise attacks won't be possible as long as the high performance intruder detection sensor is in $map:02020037$. Infiltrate $map:02020037$ stealthily and turn off Tairen's intruder detection sensor.
quest.manual: Turn of the intruder detection sensor in $map:02020037$
quest.descFameUI: Infiltrate $map:02020037$ and turn off Tairen's intruder detection sensor.

quest.name: Disaster Caused by Doing Well
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said Kharon's anger reached the extreme when the attack on $map:02020066$ failed. The angry Kharon forces are throwing grenades indiscriminately at $map:02020066$. If this continues, the damage to the refugees will be uncontrollable. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to defeat the Kharon forces. You need to receive the '$quest:40002813$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to defeat the Kharon forces.

quest.name: $npcName:11004614$'s Ulterior Motive
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ asked what kind of woman the men of Maple World like. When asked why she's curious, she was taken aback and said she just asked. Then $npcName:11004614$ suddenly asked you for $item:30001359$ on $npcName:25022202$'s tail. She said it's to figure out $npcName:25022202$'s structure by analyzing the ore, but something feels suspicious. For now, go to $map:02020066$, defeat $npcName:25022202$, and get $item:30001359$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020066$, defeat $npcName:25022202$, and get $item:30001359$.

quest.name: Developing Conspiracy
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the Daemon Army forces stationed in $map:02020067$ have been strengthened. They haven't attacked the refugees yet, but there's a need to find out why their forces have been strengthened. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find out why the Daemon Army strengthened its forces. You need to receive the '$quest:40002814$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find out why the Daemon Army strengthened its forces.

quest.name: Repeating Cruel History
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the squad witnessed Kharon kidnapping refugees. She felt sad that the squad wasn't able to rescue them since Kharon put them in the vehicle and left. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find a way to rescue the refugees. You need to receive the '$quest:40002815$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find a way to rescue the refugees.

quest.name: Terror of $map:02020068$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said there are rumors going around that $map:02020068$ is struck with fear. She said an unidentified lifeform is roaming the forest and attacking the Leshy. If nothing is done, Leshy victims will continue to increase. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to understand the situation and find a solution. You need to receive the '$quest:40002816$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to understand the situation and find a solution.

quest.name: Her Way of Persuasion
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ thinks their exchange with the Leshy became distant because they were busy taking care of the refugees. She believes they can commune with the Leshy if they meet and talk with $npc:11004620$. They talked with $npc:11004620$ not too long ago, but it wasn't at a level to satisfy $npcName:11004614$. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to talk and find out if any help is needed. You need to receive the '$quest:40002817$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to talk and find out if any help is needed.

quest.name: Mysterious Spore
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the ecosystem near $map:02020069$ is thrown into confusion. She said something like a spore scattered everywhere, and the animals of the forest are going wild because of it. $npcName:11004614$ asked that you go and investigate. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to investigate the matter. You need to receive the '$quest:40002818$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to investigate the matter.

quest.name: $map:02020069$ in Chaos
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said robot insects broke into $map:02020069$. $map:02020069$ has fallen into chaos as $npcNamePlural:25022505$ are attacking the Leshy indiscriminately. If nothing is done, $map:02020069$ will be in great danger. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to find a way to defeat $npcNamePlural:25022505$. You need to receive the '$quest:40002819$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to find a way to defeat $npcNamePlural:25022505$.

quest.name: Scattering Dark Power
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said $npcName:25022602$ that was encroached by the dark power in $map:02020070$ is releasing pollen. She said the contaminated pollen of $npcName:25022602$ is corrupting northern Kidel with dark power. Before the contamination spreads, go to $map:02020070$ and defeat $npcName:25022602$ encroached by the dark power.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020070$ and defeat $npcName:25022602$ encroached by the dark power.

quest.name: Continuing Research
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the Humanitas Research Institute is doing research on evilization. The mechanical soldiers that turned evil became black and went under the control of the Daemon Army. $npcName:11004614$ said the research will make progress if they can get the parts from $npcName:25022708$. Go to $map:02020071$, defeat $npcName:25022708$, and get $item:30001362$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020071$, defeat $npcName:25022708$, and get $item:30001362$.

quest.name: Between Sincerity and Mischief
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ asked what kind of gift do men of Maple World like. You joked saying they like very hideous and fierce pets, then she asked you capture $npcName:25022706$. You couldn't take back what you said. Go to $map:02020071$ and capture $npcName:25022706$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020071$ and capture $npcName:25022706$.

quest.name: Opponent Making Your Blood Boil
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the special forces deployed to $map:02020071$ suffered greatly from $npcName:25022701$. They had no choice but to retreat because many were injured by its monstrous strength and sharp horns. To be able to defeat the most elite troops of Humanitas... it's stirring up your competitive spirit. Go to $map:02020071$ and suppress $npcName:25022701$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020071$ and suppress $npcName:25022701$.

quest.name: Underhanded Wiretap
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said one platoon of the Humanitas regular army was captured by Tairen forces. It's because Tairen wiretapped the contents of the operation from the communication between $map:02020030$ and $map:02020033$. $npcName:11004614$ said Tairen wiretapped from $map:02020016$ using the radio tower. As long as the wiretapping continues, the losses won't end. Go to $map:02020016$ and destroy the radio tower.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020016$ and destroy the radio tower.

quest.name: The Cost of Information
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the gold bar box to be delivered to Kharon is loaded in $map:02020010$. The gold bar box is being provided to Kharon in return for giving information to Tairen. $npcName:11004614$ said Kharon will arrive in $map:02020010$ soon to claim the gold bar box. Go to $map:02020010$ and intercept the gold bar box before Kharon claims it.
quest.manual: Intercept the gold bar box in $map:02020010$
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020010$ and intercept the gold bar box before Kharon claims it.

quest.name: Guardsmen's Luxury Item
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ has an idea to make the Tairen Guardsmen be in a predicament. The guardsmen are formed of nobles and regularly use luxury item box even in the battleground to live an abundant life. She said the luxury item box transported by air from Tairen will arrive near $map:02020033$ soon. If the items in the luxury item box are seized, the Tairen Guardsmen will fall into panic. Intercept the items of the luxury item box near $map:02020033$.
quest.manual: Intercept the items of the luxury item box near $map:02020033$
quest.descFameUI: Intercept the items of the luxury item box near $map:02020033$.

quest.name: Twisted Ambition
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ obtained intel that the the robots abandoned in $map:02020051$ are making weapons. They are making weapons from waste with the purpose of selling them to Kharon. According to the intelligence department, there is going to be a weapon trade today between Kharon and the robots in $map:52100118$ at the Dumping Ground. You can't watch the accomplishment of the weapon trade strengthening Kharon's fighting power. Go to $map:52100118$ in $map:02020051$ and suppress $npcName:25023300$ and $npcName:25023301$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:52100118$ in $map:02020051$ and suppress $npcName:25023300$ and $npcName:25023301$.

quest.name: Loathsome Farming
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said Kharon is growing crops in $map:02020003$. They kidnap the refugees and put them to do hard labor in the farmland. According to our squad, a new seed arrived in $map:02020003$ not too long ago. If that seed is seized, Kharon will have problems with their food supply. Go to $map:02020003$ and seize the seed.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020003$ and seize the seed.

quest.name: Making Efforts for the Investigation
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said they detected an equipment in $map:02020035$ suspected of being an evilization converter. She said this equipment is used to convert the mechanical soldiers of Tairen to be subordinates of the Daemon Army. If the key part of the converter is taken, it will be helpful in investigating the principle of evilization. Go to $map:02020035$ and get the key part of the converter.
quest.manual: Get the key part of the converter in $map:02020035$
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020035$ and get the key part of the converter.

quest.name: Raving Evil
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said Kharon set up a high-frequency aetherine emanator in $map:02020009$. She said Kharon is trying to use it to make the abandoned robots in $map:02020009$ go out of control. $npcName:11004614$ said the allied squad carrying out an operation in $map:02020009$ some time ago suffered greatly from attacks by the robots that went out of control. The losses will continue unless the high-frequency aetherine emanator is turned off. Go to $map:02020009$ and turn off the high-frequency aetherine emanator.
quest.manual: Turn off the high-frequency aetherine emanator in $map:02020009$
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020009$ and turn off the high-frequency aetherine emanator.

quest.name: Tairen's Lethal Weapon
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the Humanitas-Maple Alliance attack on $map:02020037$ failed. She said they failed because of the long-range artillery placed by Tairen. The exceptional destructive power, firing rate, and accuracy of the long-range artillery called KG-42 made the allied forces suffer greatly and retreat. For the attack on $map:02020037$ to succeed, the long-range artillery must be suppressed. Go to $map:02020037$ and destroy the long-range artillery.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020037$ and destroy the long-range artillery.

quest.name: $map:02020066$ in Disorder
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ obtained intel that Galan is in disorder. Refugees doing whatever they want instead of keeping order are increasing. $npcName:11004614$ wants you to find out whether the cause is external or $npc:11004574$ is losing leadership. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find a way to restore order. You need to receive the '$quest:40002820$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find a way to restore order.

quest.name: Another Threat
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the squad evacuated unconscious refugees near Galan to $map:02020030$. According to the medical officer, the refugees were injured by something else and not Kharon's weapon. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to track what attacked the refugees. You need to receive the '$quest:40002821$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to track what attacked the refugees.

quest.name: Expert $npcName:11004614$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ is concerned of the refugees suffering from the heat. She didn't make an explicit request, but was giving silent pressure. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find a way to resolve the heat. You need to receive the '$quest:40002822$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find a way to resolve the heat.

quest.name: Firework of Thoughts
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said Tairen does fireworks around this time every year. It's to wish happiness for their loved ones. She's concerned the refugees of Galan might be grieved since they can't do fireworks. It would be possible for the refugees to do fireworks by using Kharon's Throwing Bomb. Go to $map:02020067$, suppress $npcName:25022303$, and get Throwing Bomb.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020067$, suppress $npcName:25022303$, and get $item:30001364$.

quest.name: Encroaching $map:02020068$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said $map:02020068$ is being rapidly encroached due to the dark power. The Daemon Army hasn't been contaminating $map:02020068$ recently, but the speed has increased. If nothing is done, $map:02020069$ might get tainted by the dark power. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to find a way to stop the contamination. You need to receive the '$quest:40002825$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to find a way to stop the contamination.

quest.name: Food Shortage in $map:02020069$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the Leshy in $map:02020069$ are going through a food shortage. The Leshy lived a rich life with the abundant tree fruits, but a food shortage... It's clear that something happened. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to investigate the cause of the food shortage. You need to receive the '$quest:40002826$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to investigate the cause of the food shortage.

quest.name: A Problem to Be Resolved
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the Daemon Army isn't stopping their attempt on stealing the 'mysterious power' of the Leshy. They are continually sending lifeforms encroached by the dark power to $map:02020069$. $npcName:11004614$ is worried because the Leshy won't be able to fend them off with their primitive weapon. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to discuss a way to tighten security. You need to receive the '$quest:40002823$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to discuss a way to tighten security.

quest.name: Unusual Movement of the Leshy
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the residents in $map:02020069$ have been noticeably active. According to the drone video, it looks like the Leshy are gathering in a specific location and it doesn't look like commercial activity. It's fine if it's something good but... you need to help the Leshy if it's something bad. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to find out what happened. You need to receive the '$quest:40002824$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to find out what happened.

quest.name: For a Full-Scale Attack
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said a full-scale attack on $map:02020070$ started. She said the regular army and the special forces will attack $map:02020070$ together. There will be many casualties due to the firm defense of $map:02020070$. The casualties can be reduced if $npcName:25022600$, the main force, is suppressed before the full-scale attack. Go to $map:02020070$ and suppress $npcName:25022600$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020070$ and suppress $npcName:25022600$.

quest.name: Spreading Evilization
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the offensive operation on $map:02020070$ has hit a snag. It's because the Daemon Army turned $npcName:25022604$ evil and deployed to $map:02020070$. She said $npcName:25022604$ is dealing great damage to the allies with its sharp poison stinger. Go to $map:02020070$ and suppress $npcName:25022604$ before there are more casualties.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020070$ and suppress $npcName:25022604$.

quest.name: Find the Source of Power
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said a few of the Daemon Army forces deployed to $map:02020071$ have monstrous combat power. $npcName:25022702$ especially has powerful combat power that can't be explained with its physical structure. $npcName:11004614$ asked the research team for their opinion and it seems highly likely that $item:30001367$ on the head of $npcName:25022702$ is its source of power. Go to $map:02020071$, defeat $npcName:25022702$, and obtain $item:30001367$ for thorough research.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020071$, defeat $npcName:25022702$, and obtain $item:30001367$.

quest.name: Spear and Shield
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the rifle bullet of the allies can't pierce the shield of $npcName:25022704$ stationed in $map:02020071$. She said they need to analyze the shield's component and find a way to pierce it in order to attack $map:02020071$. Go to $map:02020071$, defeat $npcName:25022704$, and obtain $item:30001368$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020071$, defeat $npcName:25022704$, and obtain $item:30001368$.

quest.name: Abandoned Cannon
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the outskirts of $map:02020032$ have been occupied by the Daemon Army. She said the allied forces retreated in a hurry and neglected the mid-range cannon. $npcName:11004614$ is sad because retrieving at least the parts would be very helpful to the fighting power of the allies. Go to $map:02020032$ and retrieve the mid-range cannon parts to strengthen the military power of Humanitas.
quest.manual: Retrieve the mid-range cannon parts near $map:02020032$
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020032$ and retrieve the mid-range cannon parts.

quest.name: Reward of Temptation
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said they discovered the location of the weapon box that Tairen gave Kharon. These weapon boxes were obtained by Kharon for providing information to Tairen. $npcName:11004614$ said Kharon claimed the weapon box and transported it to $map:02020016$. The weapon box can be discovered if they are ambushed there. Go to $map:02020016$ and seize the weapon box.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020016$ and seize the weapon box.

quest.name: $npcName:11004614$'s Curiosity
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the Poings in $map:02020013$ are obsessed with a certain fruit tree. It's a fruit tree with blue fruits. They attack fiercely when the scout team goes near it. $npcName:11004614$ can't stand the curiosity of why the Poings are obsessed with the fruit tree. Go to $map:02020013$ and pick the blue fruit for $npcName:11004614$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020013$ and pick the blue fruit.

quest.name: $map:02020033$ in Crisis
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said Tairen's long-range cannons are placed in the outskirts of $map:02020033$. The long-range cannon called KG-42 is a weapon with tremendous destructive power. She's worried that $map:02020033$ will receive great damage once the long-range cannons are fired. Go to $map:02020033$ before the firing begins and destroy the long-range cannons.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020033$ and destroy the long-range cannons.

quest.name: Collapsed Authority
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said $npc:11004618$ made contact with the allies through his aide, $npcName:11004619$. $npc:11004619$ offered to arrange a meeting with $npcName:11004618$ if you come to $map:02020051$ to see him. Once you gain $npcName:11004618$, you will have important information to destroy Kharon. Meet $npcName:11004619$ in $map:02020051$, figure out $npc:11004618$'s whereabouts, and make contact with $npc:11004618$.
quest.descFameUI: Meet $npcName:11004619$ in $map:02020051$, figure out $npc:11004618$'s whereabouts, and make contact with $npc:11004618$.

quest.name: Tairen's New Weapon
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said Tairen is testing a new mechanical soldier in $map:02020018$. The test subjects are existing mechanical soldiers and the latest machine in blue. $npcName:11004614$ said the scout team discovered a weapon data analyzer set up in $map:02020018$. $npcName:11004614$ thinks a performance test on the new weapon is being conducted with the data analyzer in $map:02020018$. Data analysis on the new weapon is required in order to not lose the war with Tairen. Go to $map:02020018$ and obtained the test data of the data analyzer.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020018$ and obtain the test data of the data analyzer
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020018$ and obtain the test data of the data analyzer.

quest.name: Science Is Not Everything
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the research team is researching the dark power which is the source of contamination by the Daemon Army. She said they are taking a scientific approach to analyze the dark power. You said the dark power is not a scientific phenomenon, but $npcName:11004614$ said there is nothing that can't be revealed with science. It will be faster for her to realize after experiencing it herself. Go to $map:02020036$ and collect the dark power.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020036$ and collect the dark power.

quest.name: Mysterious Ancient Ruins
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said $map:02020017$ is an ancient ruin of Kritias. Since they secured the northwestern part of Kidel, they plan to explore $map:02020017$. $npcName:11004614$ said the first journey of the exploration is securing the ancient ruin of the state building. Investigating the ruin might reveal the origin of the state building. Go to $map:02020017$ and secure the ancient ruin of the state building.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020017$ and secure the ancient ruin of the state building
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020017$ and secure the ancient ruin of the state building.

quest.name: Tamed Beast
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said they found $map:52100114$, but are having trouble entering because of $npcName:25022901$ guarding Tekin. $npcName:11004614$ said the soldiers received great damage due to their sharp tusks. It's not easy to suppress them since they are covered in armor and very fast. Go to $map:52100114$ and suppress $npcName:25022901$ before more soldiers get hurt.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:52100114$ and suppress $npcName:25022901$.

quest.name: Terror of Pitch Darkness
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the special forces attacking $map:02020070$ suffered greatly from $npcName:25022607$ and $npcName:25022608$. The Daemon Master has tremendous attack power compared to the normal group. $npcName:11004614$ said the soldiers just freeze when seeing their black cape. If the Daemon Master isn't suppressed, the attack on $map:02020070$ will not succeed. Go to $map:02020070$ and suppress $npcName:25022607$ and $npcName:25022608$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020070$ and suppress $npcName:25022607$ and $npcName:25022608$.

quest.name: Lethal Savage
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the allied soldiers attacking $map:02020070$ and $map:02020071$ suffered greatly due to the Daemon Army's beasts. They claw with their sharp toes and ram with the huge horns on their back. Even the heavily armed special forces are knocked out with a single blow. If these beasts are not suppressed, the attack on $map:02020070$ and $map:02020071$ will not succeed. Suppress $npcName:25022606$ and $npcName:25022609$ in $map:02020070$ and $npcName:25022703$ and $npcName:25022709$ in $map:02020071$.
quest.descFameUI: Suppress $npcName:25022606$ and $npcName:25022609$ in $map:02020070$ and $npcName:25022703$ and $npcName:25022709$ in $map:02020071$.

quest.name: Distant Victory
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said they were able to take over the northern part of Kidel due to the joint operation with the Maple Alliance, but they suffered greatly from attacks by Tairen's mechanical soldiers. $npcName:25023003$, $npcName:25023004$, and $npcName:25023303$ especially dealt great damage with their powerful combat power to the soldiers. $npcName:11004614$ said they might seize the chance of victory in this war with Tairen if they are suppressed. Defeat $npcName:25023003$ and $npcName:25023004$ in $map:52100115$ which is connected to $map:02020013$ and $npcName:25023303$ in $map:52100118$ which is connected to $map:02020051$.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcName:25023003$ and $npcName:25023004$ in $map:52100115$ and $npcName:25023303$ in $map:52100118$.

quest.name: Pessimistic Simulation
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the special forces will soon ambush Kharon's base, $map:52100114$ and $map:52100116$. If they go through with this raid operation, they will suffer greatly from $npcName:25022902$, $npcName:25022903$, and $npcName:25023102$. It's because the result of the combat simulation was the soldiers are weak to these Kharon forces. Factors that will make this raid operation fail need to be removed. Suppress $npcName:25022902$ and $npcName:25022903$ in $map:52100114$ which is connected to $map:02020067$ and $npcName:25023102$ in $map:52100116$ which is connected to $map:02020003$.
quest.descFameUI: Suppress $npcName:25022902$ and $npcName:25022903$ in $map:52100114$ and $npcName:25023102$ in $map:52100116$.
